allow: Bash(do sed -i "s/const { authenticate } = require/const { authenticate } = require/g; s|''../middlewares/auth''|''../middlewares/auth.middleware''|g; s|''../middlewares/validation''|''../middlewares/validation.middleware''|g" $file)

Bash(do sed -i "s/bg-red-600/bg-orange-500/g; s/bg-red-500/bg-orange-500/g; s/text-red-400/text-orange-400/g; s/text-red-500/text-orange-500/g; s/border-red-600/border-orange-500/g; s/border-red-500/border-orange-500/g; s/from-red-600/from-orange-500/g; s/to-red-600/to-orange-500/g" "$file")
Bash(do sed -i "s/from-magenta-500 to-cyan-500/from-magenta-500 via-purple-500 to-cyan-500/g; s/hover:from-magenta-600 hover:to-cyan-600/hover:opacity-90/g" "$file")

Bash(timeout 60 bash -c 'while true; do status=$(curl -s https://backend-production-28c3.up.railway.app/health 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""ok"" || echo ""waiting""); if [ ""$status"" = ""ok"" ]; then echo ""Backend healthy""; break; fi; echo ""Waiting for deploy...""; sleep 10; done')

Bash(timeout 60 bash -c 'while true; do status=$(curl -s https://backend-production-28c3.up.railway.app/health 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""ok"" || echo ""waiting""); if [ ""$status"" = ""ok"" ]; then echo ""✅ Backend healthy!""; break; fi; echo ""⏳ Aguardando deploy... ($SECONDS segundos)""; sleep 5; done')

Bash(timeout 90 bash -c 'while true; do status=$(curl -s https://backend-production-28c3.up.railway.app/health 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""ok"" || echo ""waiting""); if [ ""$status"" = ""ok"" ]; then echo ""✅ Backend online e saudável!""; break; fi; echo ""⏳ Aguardando deploy... ($SECONDS segundos)""; sleep 5; done')

Bash(timeout 120 bash -c 'while true; do status=$(curl -s https://backend-production-28c3.up.railway.app/health 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""ok"" || echo ""waiting""); if [ ""$status"" = ""ok"" ]; then echo ""✅ Backend ONLINE e funcionando!""; curl -s https://backend-production-28c3.up.railway.app/health | python -m json.tool; break; fi; echo ""⏳ Aguardando deploy... ($SECONDS segundos)""; sleep 5; done')
